1010000110110101 0100101110001000 0 -> sum: 1110110100111101, cout: 0
0101101001011101 0010000100011000 0 -> sum: 0111101101110101, cout: 0

0011010010111011 1000110010001100 0 -> sum: 1100000101000111, cout: 0
0001011000011011 0000011101100011 0 -> sum: 0001110101111110, cout: 0
1000011101111100 0110000100010110 0 -> sum: 1110100010010010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
